column4: Installed Ubuntu 9.10 no sound on my USB headphones. Booted to XP Sound on headphones so headphones are ok. Clicked Volume Icon on the right of the screen and turned to max. Still no sound. How do I fix?
you may need to adjust a different output on the mixer to get sound
is that on preferences-->Sound-->Hardware and changing output?
that could also be your problem, not set to output through the headphones
